resources.string:
"# Here a man is being executed.
" "
" "# You will be given a Random Word related along with a Hint.
" "
" "# You have to guess the letters of the word.
" "
" "# If that letter is in the word then You are good.
" "
" "# If the letter isn't in the word then a body part will be added to the gallows.
" "
" "# You can continue guessing letters until you can either solve the word or	" "all six body parts are on the gallows ie. You only have six wrong selections.
"
